ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Xegony Bards needing Epic Help
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds really good - I d be very interested - and I m sure we could get some other DoK s to help.  My main issue is my schedule is pretty tight as I work as a
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds really good - I'd be very interested - and I'm sure we could get some
other DoK's to help. My main issue is my schedule is pretty tight as I work
as a professional musician - I'm pretty much only consistently available on
Sunday and Monday nights, and most Friday nights, and Saturday days.

If we can make this a go - let me know your ezboard's URL

Thanks!

Slyde


-----Original Message-----
From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 11, 2001 9:03 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Xegony Bards needing Epic Help


Tzeetch, Slyde, I was looking for you guys last night. I see why I didn't
find Tzeetch, I could not recall how to spelll the name! Anyways, I was
talking to Kaas about doing the undead bard/Trak. Seems that his guild,
Death Knights has a falling out with SoA (I haven't heard the dirt yet) and
so they can't field enough folks to finish his epic. We were talking about
guilds and people that he can talk to about helping do his last step. It
dawned on me that he is pretty much in the same boat you guys are talking
about being in. So my question is, would it be possible for the guilds you
guys are in to get involved? I'm thinking we would end up with some DK's,
some Muffins, some Marauders of the Dragon and probably some of my bunch,
Venator Sapentia. I'm sure Kaas's bunch would agree to help you guys do
Gore. Now granted, there's alot of luck involved. The day/time you catch
Gore or the undead bard or whatever red dragon up may not be the day
everyone is on or is free to drop whatever. I would have liked to go do Trak
for Kaas last night if the bard was up but was committed to helping Annelia
and Sybian in Fear with their epics. This has more to do with meeting more
people of the right level and mindset as a start. I'd like to see all the
bards I know get their epics and I will help whenever I can. We can
coordinate via our ezboard if you like. I told Kaas to go start a thread on
our general board but don't see it yet. What do you guys think?

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Venator Sapentia, Xegony

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
